Why Choose Professional Epoxy Floor Coatings?

Our professional-grade epoxy floor coatings provide superior durability, chemical resistance, and stunning appearance that transforms any space.

Superior Durability

Our 3-layer system withstands heavy traffic, impacts, and chemical spills better than any DIY coating.

Easy Maintenance

Non-porous surface resists stains and cleans easily with simple soap and water.

Enhanced Safety

Slip-resistant texture options and improved lighting reflection for safer surfaces.

Increased Property Value

Professional floor coatings significantly increase your property's value and appeal.

Finished Result

Our Professional 3-Layer System

Unlike single-coat DIY products, our professional system uses three distinct layers for maximum durability and performance.

1

Base Coat - Primer Layer

High-penetration epoxy primer that bonds directly to the concrete, creating an unbreakable foundation.

  • Penetrates deep into concrete pores
  • Creates chemical bond with substrate
  • Prevents moisture and vapor transmission
  • Provides superior adhesion
2

Color Coat - Decorative Layer

Pigmented epoxy layer that provides color, pattern, and initial protection.

  • UV-stable color pigments
  • Decorative flake integration
  • Chemical resistance properties
  • Seamless, non-porous surface
3

Top Coat - Protection Layer

Clear polyurethane or polyaspartic topcoat that provides ultimate protection and longevity.

  • Superior abrasion resistance
  • UV protection for color stability
  • Chemical and stain resistance
  • Optional slip-resistant additives

Professional Installation Process

Our meticulous installation process ensures a flawless finish that lasts for decades.

1

Surface Preparation

Diamond grinding removes all contaminants, opens concrete pores, and creates the perfect profile for adhesion.

2

Crack Repair

All cracks and imperfections are filled with structural repair compounds for a smooth, uniform surface.

3

Primer Application

High-penetration epoxy primer is applied to create an unbreakable bond with the concrete substrate.

4

Color Coat & Flakes

Pigmented epoxy color coat is applied, followed by broadcast of decorative color flakes for texture and beauty.

5

Flake Removal

Excess flakes are removed and the surface is lightly sanded to ensure proper adhesion of the topcoat.

6

Protective Topcoat

Clear polyurethane or polyaspartic topcoat provides ultimate protection and enhances the floor's appearance.

Easy Maintenance & Care

Daily Care

  • Sweep or vacuum regularly
  • Clean spills immediately
  • Use soft-bristled broom
  • Avoid abrasive cleaners

Weekly Cleaning

  • Mop with mild detergent
  • Use microfiber mop head
  • Rinse with clean water
  • Allow to air dry

Periodic Deep Clean

  • Use degreasing cleaner if needed
  • Scrub with soft brush
  • Rinse thoroughly
  • Apply floor polish if desired

Our Guarantee

20-Year Durability

We guarantee our professional floor coatings will maintain their integrity and appearance for 20 years with proper care.

Adhesion Guarantee

Our coatings will not peel, chip, or delaminate when properly installed on suitable substrates.

Color Stability

UV-stable pigments ensure your floor's color won't fade or yellow over time.

All work is performed by trained, certified technicians using professional-grade materials and equipment.
